node.title: Adelaide's last drive-in cinema to close after more than 65 years
node.alt: Cars in front of drive-in screen.
node.description: Metropolitan Adelaide's last drive-in cinema will close its gates for the final time in early 2022, with its owners citing a changing film industry, piracy, the COVID-19 pandemic and the introduction of daylight saving as reasons it is no longer viable.
node.content:
["The glow of the\u00a0big screen will fade when Adelaide's last suburban drive-in theatre closes at the start of 2022.", "Owners of the Mainline Drive-in at Gepps Cross, about 10 kilometres north of the CBD, posted news of the cinema's closure on social media on Monday.", "\"After operating for more than 65 years, the Wallis family has made the very hard and emotional decision to cease its operations at Gepps Cross Mainline Drive-in,\" the statement read.", "\"It was not a decision we have made lightly, but with the changing nature of the cinema industry, the introduction of daylight saving, film piracy and now the lengthy COVID-19 epidemic, we as a family all agree it is the best decision for the future of Wallis Cinema.\"", "According to details on the State Library of South Australia's website, the Mainline opened on Friday, October 7, 1954, as the country's first \"drive-in, walk-in\" theatre.", "It had a capacity for patrons watching in 500 cars, parking for an additional 500 cars and seating for 400 patrons.", "The opening program's main feature film\u00a0was Audrey Hepburn and Gregory Peck's Roman Holiday.", "However, the road\u00a0to opening\u00a0drive-ins in South Australia\u00a0was bumpy.", "
Mid-century public\u00a0entertainment 'morality'
", "The state's\u00a0parliament debated the Places of Public Entertainment Act Amendment Bill in 1954, with a number of speakers concerned with \"morality\".", "", "
Former premier Don Dunstan was supportive of drive-in cinemas.(Supplied: Flinders University Library/Dunstan collection)
", "Then Hindmarsh MLA Cyril\u00a0Hutchens was most worried, believing the opening of drive-in cinemas would lead to \"females attending in green French bathers, with their hair dyed red, and accessories to match\".", "\"We should take all possible action to preserve the morals of our young people and I am glad we are to have legislation to deal with drive-in theatres,\" Mr Hutchens\u00a0said.", "However, then Norwood MLA Don Dunstan, who went on to become the state's premier, disagreed.", "\"If people are going to resort to motor cars for the purposes of immorality they are not likely to purchase theatre tickets and drive in beside other vehicles to do what they might otherwise do on some lonely country road,\" Mr Dunstan\u00a0said at the time.", "
Sun sets on\u00a0drive-in
", "The Wallis family's statement said the Mainline would\u00a0continue playing movies throughout summer, with its final film to show in February 2022.", "", "
Mickey's Diner at the Mainline Drive-in at Gepps Cross.(Facebook: Mainline Drive-in)
", "And the Gepps Cross Sunday Market, which is also held at the drive-in location, will continue to operate through summer and is \"expected to continue in operation after the drive-in is closed\".", "Wallis Cinema's five other seated theatres in South Australia will remain in operation."]
